## sum2() function

Calculates the sum of two numbers

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function sum2(a: number, b: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | number | First number |
|  b | number | Second number |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
